full_text: 2024/KER/2938 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE BECHU KURIAN THOMAS MONDAY, THE 15'4 pay OF JANUARY 2024 / 25TH POUSHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 266 OF 2024 CRIME NO.7/2022 OF VELLAYIL POLICE STATION, KOZHIKODE PETITIONER/ACCUSED: SHEHANA PARVIN AGED 23 YEARS D/O.SAKEER.P.K., THAYYIL HOUSE, PUTHIYANGADI.P.0O., KOZHIKODE DISTRICT, PIN - 673021 BY ADVS. PRINSUN PHILIP U.K.DEVIDAS RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT AND DEFACTO COMPLAINANT: 1 STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, PIN - 682031 2 STATION HOUSE OFFICER VELLAYIL POLICE STATION, KOZHIKODE DISTRICT, PIN - 673011 3 MUHAMMED SAHADHA AGED 26 YEARS S/0.SAKEER, THAYYIL HOUSE, PUTHIYANGADI.P.0., KOZHIKODE DISTRICT, PIN - 673021 BY ADV. M.C. ASHI PUBLIC PROSECUTOR THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 15.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Be Qs 2024/KER/2938 BECHU KURIAN THOMAS, J. Dated this the 15" day of January, 2024 ORDER Petitioner alleges that Crime No.7/2024 of Vellayil Police Station, Kozhikode District, has been registered under Section 57 of the Kerala Police Act, 2011, pointing out the missing of a person. 2. According to the petitioner, the missing person is she herself and that she is residing with her friend on her own volition without any compulsion and she is not missing from any place. Though her presence either before the Police Station or the Jurisdictional Magistrate would suffice to close the crime, she apprehends repercussions from the locals. 3. The learned Public Prosecutor upon instructions submitted that, the appearance of the petitioner before the Police Station would not create any issues and that her presence is necessary for the progress of the investigation. 4. In view of the above, petitioner shall appear within ten days from today before the Station House Officer, Vellayil Police Station, Kozhikode District, in order to conclude the investigation. However, if the petitioner apprehends any action from any quarters, necessarily, appropriate and effective protection shall be granted to her by the Station House Officer of Vellayil Police Station. Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above. Sd/- BECHU KURIAN THOMAS JUDGE Jka/15.01.24 3s 2024/KER/2938 APPENDIX OF CRL.MC 266/2024 PETITIONERS ANNEXURES Annexure I TRUE COPY OF THE AADHAR CARD NO.8012 1417 8683 OF THE PETITIONER. Annexure ITI TRUE COPY OF THE AADHAR CARD NO. 8465 6657 1963 OF MR. AJIL. T.S. Annexure -IIT TRUE COPY OF THE PHOTOGRAPH OF THE MARRIAGE CEREMONY OF THE PETITIONER AND AJIL.T.S. Annexure -IV TRUE COPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO. 7/2024 OF VELLAYIL POLICE STATION DATED 03.01.2024.
